heronarts.lx.modulator
Class TriangleLFO

java.lang.Object
  heronarts.lx.modulator.LXModulator
      heronarts.lx.modulator.TriangleLFO

public class TriangleLFO
extends LXModulator

A triangular LFO is a simple linear modulator that oscillates between a low and hi value over a specified time period.

public LXModulator trigger()
Description copied from class: LXModulator
